name: FISH (snowflakeartist)
description:
Hello! Our group decided to raise awareness for UN SDG 14: Life Under Water. We believe a game in the point of view of a fish tackling the rapid changes to its environment was the best way to do so. Ta-da, our game called Fish. 

Here the player will play as a fish and try to survive pollutants, shrinking food supply, fishermen, rise in temperatures, etc. Try our game and see how long you survive. Have fun and good luck!

CONTROLS:
WASD or arrow keys to move.

Made by Matthew Wang, Alice Chai, Ashley Thong, and Yu Zhong Yao for York University Game Jam 2022.
